bibl.title: Coffin or Bed? Decorated Biers from Hellenistic and Roman Egypt.
Le myrte et la rose. Mélanges offerts à Françoise Dunand par ses élèves, collègues et amis.

bibl.note: Decorated biers: general observations. - Fragments of a bier from Kellis. - Additional pieces. - The souls of Pe and Nekhen. - Pp. 365: Addendum; - 366-368: Appendix. List of decorated biers from the Ptolemaic and Roman periods [Nos 1-14].
bibl.seg: Olaf E. Kaper, Coffin or Bed? Decorated Biers from Hellenistic and Roman Egypt.

Gaëlle Tallet & Christiane Zivie-Coche (edd.), Le myrte et la rose. Mélanges offerts à Françoise Dunand par ses élèves, collègues et amis. Tome 2 = CENiM. 9 (Montpellier, 2014) pp. 357-370, 2 pll. n./bl. et coul.

Decorated biers: general observations. - Fragments of a bier from Kellis. - Additional pieces. - The souls of Pe and Nekhen. - Pp. 365: Addendum; - 366-368: Appendix. List of decorated biers from the Ptolemaic and Roman periods [Nos 1-14].
